name: Richard WOJTCZAK, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of PA., PA. DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph. D, Fredric A. Rosemeyer, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Laurel Highlands, Ms. Rhonda Stairs, Supervisor of Records, State Correctional Institution at Laurel Highlands, Appellees

parties: Richard WOJTCZAK, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of PA., PA. DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph. D, Fredric A. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of July, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
